name: The Domes of Sha
description:
The Domes Of Sha is a single player text adventure.

This game is set on the planet of Olaxas which has endured a great war. The only survivors are of the Sha tribe whose valley may be the only inhabitable place on a now barren world. Due to an unspecified galactic event, Olaxis is doomed. The survivors know this just as they also know they must leave the apparent safety of their homeland but they are trapped by 'The Cold Fear' and none has the strength of will to venture forth and explore the wasteland. Up steps the player, accompanied by Grunt his/her faithful mugrat, to take on the challenge

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well RAMSAVE and RAMLOAD. Some tasks can only be completed by Grunt and for these more advanced commands are needed, one supplied example command being 'SAY TO GRUNT "FETCH THE STICK".
